amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Wildland Fire Management for hazardous fuels reduction activities by $19 million with offsets from the Department of Agriculture Land Acquisition program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase hazardous fuels reduction activities by $19,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 298 (Roll no. 381).
